channel.title: How to use the landscape editor by xEnt?
channel.description: I'm a little confused. I run it. I'm using DivinePK 5.0. Do I open something in the Client Folder or the Server Folder? If so, what is the name of the file? Thanks.

item.title: How to use the landscape editor by xEnt?
item.dc:creator: @Godandjesus Godandjesus
item.description:
@Godandjesus wrote:

[quote=“thiefmn6092, post:7, topic:241885”][quote author=~Kyle link=topic=318253.msg2525290#msg2525290 date=1226171995]

then you’ll realize that writing code for a client that is so out of date when you could be writing something of your own is a waste of time.

You expect him to write lines of code when he can’t use a landscape editor?
[/quote]

i don’t see why people continue to mess with classic servers.[/quote]

Because everything sucks in rs2: PKing, graphics, training, combat system etc…

Read full topic
item.source: How to use the landscape editor by xEnt?
